Package zebra4j

Interface Attributes

public interface Attributes
A library of people attributes, demonstrating different ways to define them.

  • Field Summary

  • Field Details

    • PET

      static final AttributeType PET
      Pet attribute. Serves as an example how to define attributes with BasicAttributeType

    • CLOTHES

      static final AttributeType CLOTHES
      Clothes attribute. Serves as an example how to define attributes as an enum.

      Defining attributes as an enum allows for value-dependent implementation of methods like AttributeType.questionSentencePart(java.util.Locale) or Attribute.description(java.util.Locale) .

    • AT_HOUSE

      static final AttributeType AT_HOUSE

    • NAME

      static final AttributeType NAME

    • CRIMINAL

      static final AttributeType CRIMINAL

    • DEFAULT_TYPES

      static final Set<AttributeType> DEFAULT_TYPES
      The set of attributes used by the demos
